nodes.text: Hunger is a mini adventure for any era, published on the Wizards of the Coast website. It was written by Morrie Mullins and published on June 19, 2003.

"Hunger" is a mini-adventure in which the heroes must resolve a conflict on the small mining moon of Pinett between two rival factions, the Corsignis Property Alliance and the Jon-Tow Economic Development Group.
"Hunger" is intended for four player characters of 10th to 12th level.
